title: AI/ML - Machine Learning Engineer, Siri Understanding
summary: Play a part in the next revolution in human-computer interaction. Contribute to the product that is redefining mobile computing through voice interaction.
description: You will be part of a team that is responsible for developing and integrating Siri’s speech and audio experience in a full range of Apple devices. Your focus will be to continuously improve the invocation experience of Siri voice assistant on all Apple devices across the globe.
key_qualifications: Strong background in applied machine learning and deep learning; experience in speech, speaker, and/or language recognition a plus. Proficiency in deep learning / machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow) and scripting languages (e.g., Python, bash), with strong software engineering fundamentals and an interest in optimizing and scaling systems globally.
education_experience: PhD in a Machine Learning, Computer Science or related field, or M.S. with 3+ experiences in the area of Speech/Language Processing or Machine Learning
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
